div.div: Empowering Today's Learners to Become Tomorrow's Leaders

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

a.title: Aerial View of Middle High School

img.alt: Aerial View of Middle High School

div.p:
Located in South Amboy, New Jersey, our school system serves about 1200 students in pre-kindergarten through 12th grade. We invite you to learn more about our school district and its many programs.
Vision Statement: Empowering Today's Learners to Become Tomorrow's Leaders
Mission Statement: The Mission of the South Amboy School District is to educate and empower today's learners to develop intellectually, emotionally, and socially as tomorrow's leaders within a diverse community of supportive and committed educators, parents, and citizens.

div.div: South Amboy Public Schools is working hard to ensure our students are healthy and ready to learn in school every day. We understand you may be concerned about how the current outbreak of the 2019 Novel Coronavirus in Asia will impact our school community.
Watch videos of our staff sending photo messages to our students...
Click on Read More to access the Student Check-in Form. Student (parents of younger students) must check-in by 9:30 a.m. daily.

br.br: South Amboy Public Schools does not discriminate on the basis of sex, age, race, color, religion, handicapping conditions, or national origin in employment or educational programs and activities.

div.div:
240 John Street, South Amboy, NJ 08879
Phone 732-525-2100 | Fax 732-727-0730
